name: Jhon Mcneil Magtibay
title: Full Stack Developer
about:
Hi! I'm Mcneil. 
 
I'm a full-stack developer who specializes in backend development, with a strong focus on building efficient, scalable, and secure server-side applications. I love tackling complex problems and designing systems that run smoothly behind the scenes while ensuring a seamless experience on the front end. 

When I’m not coding, you’ll probably find me immersed in survival and puzzle games — I enjoy the challenge of strategic thinking and problem-solving, whether it’s surviving in a digital wilderness or cracking intricate puzzles.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology major in Business Analiytics
education.institution: Batangas State University The National Engineering School - Mabini Campus
Anselmo A. Sandoval Memorial National High School
